graphs

Class AbstractGraph<V,E extends Edge<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphs.AbstractGraph<V,E>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirectedGraph, UndirectedGraph

    public abstract class AbstractGraph<V,E extends Edge<V>>
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public abstract void add(E edge)
        Add an edge to the graph.
        Parameters:
        edge - must not be null. Its endpoints must be contained in the graph.

      • add

        public abstract void add(V vertex)
        Add vertex to the graph
        Parameters:
        vertex - must not be null. Must not be already contained in the graph.

      • areAdjacent

        public abstract boolean areAdjacent(V vertexA,
                  V vertexB)
        Returns true if two vertices are adjacent (if there is an edge between the two vertices)
        Parameters:
        vertexA - must be contained in the graph.
        vertexB - must be contained in the graph.
        Returns:
        true if vertexA and vertexB are adjacent.

      • contains

        public abstract boolean contains(V vertex)
        Returns true if the vertex is contained in the graph
        Parameters:
        vertex - vertex to test
        Returns:
        true if found

        V vertexB)
        Get an edge between two adjacent vertices
        Parameters:
        vertexA - Must not be null.
        vertexB - Must not be null.
        Returns:
        edge between vertexA and vertexB.

      • getEdges

        public abstract java.util.Collection<E> getEdges()
        Get all edges in the graph
        Returns:
        collection containing all edges

      • getNeighbours

        public abstract java.util.Collection<V> getNeighbours(V vertex)
        Get neighbours of a vertex

        A neighbour of a vertex is another vertex that can be reached from the first through an edge.

        In a directed graph, a vertex B can only be reached from vertex A if there is and edge with origin A and destination B

        Parameters:
        vertex - to get neighbours of
        Returns:
        collection containing neighbours of the vertex

      • getVertices

        public abstract java.util.Collection<V> getVertices()
        Get all vertices in the graph
        Returns:
        collection containing all vertices

      • isMultigraph

        public boolean isMultigraph()
        Returns if the graph is a multigraph
        Returns:
        True if multiple edges between two vertices are allowed

      • loopsAllowed

        public boolean loopsAllowed()
        Returns if loops are allowed in the graph
        Returns:
        True is loops are allowed

      • order

        public abstract int order()
        Order of the graph (number of vertices contained)
        Returns:
        integer indicating order of the graph

      • remove

        public abstract void remove(E edge)
        Remove edge from the graph
        Parameters:
        edge - must not be null. Must be contained in the graph.

      • remove

        public abstract void remove(V vertex)
        Remove vertex and its incident edges from the graph
        Parameters:
